== wmean.m ==
Compute a weighted mean

[http://guillaumemaze.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/matlab/codes/statistics/wmean.m Download here]

{{{
% wmean Compute a weighted mean
%
% M = wmean(W,X)
% 
% Compute the mean of values into array X with weights W.
%	M = sum(W(i)*X(i)) / sum(W(i))
%
% See also:
%	wstd
%
% Created: 2011-02-14.
% All rights reserved.
}}}
